unnormalised: Hey everyone! Any updates on Bumrah's back? Last I heard from sources near NCA Bangalore, he was doing rehab. Hope he recovers before the Asia Cup! Also, heard Dhawan pulled a hamstring? Koi Mil Gaya moment, trying to chase that ball, I guess! Wishing them a speedy recovery - India needs them both! We need to win, yaar!
